channel.title: CNN brk
channel.description: 这是一个追踪CNN brknews的种子

item.title: 标准普尔 500 指数首次收于 5,000 点以上，这是一个具有里程碑意义的时刻，整个华尔街都弥漫着看涨情绪
item.description: The S&P 500 closes above 5,000 for the first time, a landmark moment as bullish sentiment spreads across Wall Street cnn.it/3SQkvkq

item.title: 马里兰州前州长拉里-霍根（Larry Hogan）表示，他将竞选美国参议员，这为共和党在深蓝州争取翻盘提供了强有力的候选人。
item.description: Former Maryland Gov. Larry Hogan says he's running for US Senate, providing Republicans with a strong candidate in their bid to flip a seat in a deep-blue state. cnn.it/49akDRr

item.title: 蒙大拿州众议员马特-罗森代尔（Matt Rosendale）正式参选参议员，为右翼选民和保守派建制派之间的初选之争埋下伏笔。
item.description: Rep. Matt Rosendale is officially running for Senate in Montana, setting up a primary fight between the right-wing base and conservative establishment. cnn.it/498Dj49

item.title: 以色列总理内塔尼亚胡指示军方准备在地面行动之前从加沙南部城市拉法疏散 100 多万巴勒斯坦人。
item.description: Israeli PM Netanyahu directs military to prepare to evacuate over 1 million Palestinians from southern Gaza city of Rafah ahead of a ground operation. cnn.it/4bp1qwS

item.title: 美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）预测，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将赢得内华达州共和党党团会议。他在选票上没有遇到主要对手。
item.description: Donald Trump wins the Nevada GOP caucuses, CNN projects, on a day that also saw arguments over his 2024 eligibility before the Supreme Court. He faced no major opposition on the ballot. cnn.it/49MqnB1

item.title: 特别顾问的严厉报告发现拜登故意保留和披露机密信息，但表示他不会面临指控
item.description: Scathing special counsel report finds Biden willfully retained and disclosed classified information, but says he will not face charges cnn.it/3UBjRIY

item.title: 泽连斯基总统宣布解雇乌克兰最高将领，这是俄罗斯开始全面入侵以来乌克兰最大的军事动荡
item.description:
President Zelensky announces the firing of Ukraine's top general, the country's biggest military shake-up since Russia's full-scale invasion began
cnn.com/2024/02/08/europe/za…

item.title: 联邦通信委员会（FCC）表示，它将立即取缔以人工智能创建的虚假声音为特征的诈骗电话，打击所谓的 "深度伪造 "技术，专家称这种技术可能会破坏选举安全或加剧欺诈行为。
item.description: The FCC says it is immediately outlawing scam robocalls featuring fake, artificial intelligence-created voices, cracking down on so-called "deepfake" technology that experts say could undermine election security or supercharge fraud cnn.com/2024/02/08/tech/fcc-…

item.title: 最高法院正在就特朗普在导致 1 月 6 日国会大厦骚乱的事件中所扮演的角色对其选票资格提出的重大挑战进行听证。关注并收听直播。
item.description:
The Supreme Court is hearing arguments in a blockbuster challenge to Trump's ballot eligibility over his role in events that led to the January 6 Capitol riot. Follow and listen live.
cnn.com/politics/live-news/s…

item.title: 美国军方官员称，一架直升机在一次训练飞行中坠毁在白雪覆盖的偏远树林中，五名海军陆战队员确认死亡
item.description: Five Marines confirmed dead after helicopter went down in remote, snow-covered woods during a training flight, US military officials say cnn.it/42vaJY0

item.title: 英国科学家称他们创造了新的核聚变能源记录，使清洁、无限的能源离现实更近了一步
item.description: Scientists in the UK say they've set a new nuclear fusion energy record, taking the clean, limitless energy source a step closer to reality cnn.it/3us2TSw

item.title: 反战候选人鲍里斯-纳杰日丁（Boris Nadezhdin）被禁止参加俄罗斯大选，进一步清除了反对弗拉基米尔-普京的政治势力
item.description: Anti-war candidate Boris Nadezhdin barred from Russian election, further clearing the political landscape of opponents to Vladimir Putin cnn.it/42v2wmE

item.title: 消息人士称，宾夕法尼亚州两名警察在接到报警称有人被困在一栋房子里并开枪后受伤。
item.description:
Two Pennsylvania police officers injured after responding to a call about a person barricaded in a house and firing shots, source says.
cnn.it/48dgJG6

item.title: 美国中央司令部称，美军在巴格达的一次军事打击行动中击毙了一名卡提卜真主党指挥官，他对袭击该地区美军的行为负有责任。
item.description: A US military strike killed a Kataib Hezbollah commander in Baghdad responsible for attacks on American forces in the region, US Central Command says. cnn.com/2024/02/07/politics/…

item.title: 参议院否决了两党达成的边境和对外援助方案，共和党人对部分由本党成员制定的协议进行了令人震惊的抨击
item.description: Senate rejects bipartisan border and foreign aid package in a stunning rebuke by Republicans of a deal crafted in part by a member of their own party cnn.it/3HTXhUh

item.title: 以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡（Benjamin Netanyahu）拒绝了哈马斯提出的加沙停火建议，坚称以色列 "彻底胜利 "的目标指日可待
item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu rejects an offer from Hamas for a ceasefire in Gaza, insisting that Israel's goal of "complete victory" is within reach cnn.com/middleeast/live-news…

item.title: 一架据报失踪的军用直升机被发现坠毁在加利福尼亚州的一片森林中，救援人员正在搜寻机上的五名海军陆战队员
item.description:
A military helicopter reported missing has been found crashed in a California forest as rescue crews search for the five Marines who were onboard
cnn.com/2024/02/07/us/missin…

item.title: 救援人员正在搜寻一架从拉斯维加斯飞往圣迭戈途中失踪的军用直升机，机上载有五名海军陆战队员。
item.description:
Rescue crews are searching for a military helicopter with five Marines onboard that went missing en route from Las Vegas to San Diego
cnn.it/4bxkskX

item.title: 美国环保局（EPA）最终确定了一项针对工业厂房和车辆的新规定，该规定已经酝酿了十多年。一些专家认为该规定不够有力。
item.description:
The EPA finalizes a new rule for industrial plants and vehicles that's been over a decade in the making. Some experts say it's not strong enough.
cnn.it/3SttkiB

item.title: 哈马斯呼吁以色列分阶段撤出加沙，并制定结束战争的计划，作为对国际社会提出的人质和停火协议的反击
item.description: Hamas calls for phased Israeli withdrawal from Gaza and a plan to end the war in counteroffer to internationally proposed hostage and ceasefire deal cnn.it/497LxJK

item.title: 据美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）预测，即使特朗普不在选票上，尼基-黑利也不会赢得内华达州的共和党初选，选民选择的是 "这些候选人中的任何一个"。由于该州共和党将于周四举行党团会议，届时特朗普将出现在选票上，因此没有代表参选。
item.description: Nikki Haley won't win Nevada's GOP primary even as Trump wasn't on the ballot, CNN projects, with voters opting for "none of these candidates." No delegates were at stake as the state GOP will hold caucuses Thursday, when Trump will be on the ballot. cnn.it/3Su4ZJI

item.title: 美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）预测，乔-拜登总统将赢得内华达州的民主党初选。他在该州面临的只是名义上的竞争，因为他很可能与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）进行复选。
item.description: President Joe Biden wins Nevada's Democratic primary, CNN projects. He faced only nominal competition in the state as he looks toward a likely rematch with Donald Trump. cnn.it/3w20sGC

item.title: 消息人士称，共和党全国委员会女主席罗娜-麦克丹尼尔（Ronna McDaniel）提出在南卡罗来纳州初选后辞职，以便特朗普能够建立新的领导层
item.description: Republican National Committee Chairwoman Ronna McDaniel offers to resign after South Carolina primary so Trump can install new leadership, sources say cnn.it/3OAXAqR

item.title: 众议院在遭到共和党和民主党领导人反对后，未能通过 176 亿美元的以色列援助方案
item.description:
House fails to pass package for $17.6 billion in Israel aid after receiving opposition from Republicans and Democratic leaders
cnn.it/42vbY9E

item.title: 众议院弹劾国土安全部长亚历杭德罗-马约尔卡斯（Alejandro Mayorkas）的投票失败，这是共和党领导层的一次惊人失败和尴尬。
item.description: House vote to impeach Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas fails, a stunning defeat and embarrassment for Republican leadership. cnn.it/3SOG0lC

item.title: ESPN、福克斯和华纳兄弟探索公司将联手打造一个超级平台，将他们的体育资产集中在一个流媒体平台上。
item.description: ESPN, Fox and Warner Bros. Discovery are teaming up to create a super-platform that will house their sports assets under one streaming roof cnn.it/486YUsb

item.title: 智利前总统塞巴斯蒂安-皮聂拉的办公室称，皮聂拉在智利直升机坠毁事故中丧生
item.description: Former Chilean President Sebastian Pinera has died in a helicopter crash in Chile, his office says cnn.it/494Tcsk

item.title: 美国国家运输安全委员会（NTSB）的报告称，联邦调查人员认为，阿拉斯加航空公司客机在飞行途中爆炸的部分缺少 4 个固定螺栓。
item.description: Federal investigators believe 4 bolts intended to hold the part of the Alaska Airlines plane that blew off mid-flight were missing, NTSB report says cnn.it/49qqge8

item.title: 在 2021 年密歇根州校园枪击案中，詹妮弗-克拉布里（Jennifer Crumbley）的儿子杀害了四名学生，陪审团认定她犯有过失杀人罪。
item.description: Jury finds Jennifer Crumbley guilty of manslaughter after a 2021 Michigan school shooting in which her son killed four students cnn.it/3Oyi5V2

item.title: 陪审团对密歇根校园枪手母亲过失杀人一案做出判决，该案考验谁该为大规模枪击事件负责
item.description: Jury reaches verdict in manslaughter trial of Michigan school shooter's mother in a case testing who's responsible for a mass shooting cnn.it/3Sw0r5j
